# aria_icon (Data Source)

Icon data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "aria_icon" "example" {
  id = "cfac7e0e-7367-3fd3-8e39-cbae66392fcd"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Icon identifier

### Read-Only

- `content` (String) Icon content
